OOC: Do you know how unrealistic that sounds? These battles do take place in 
real time you know.

In a message dated 2/4/02 8:28:00 PM Eastern Standard Time, 
dewboy30816@... writes:


> SS catches it, uses his breath to weld it back together, goes to robot 
> mode causing one beam to miss and the other to hit his leg, and 
> without flinching puts the boomerang back in his weapon, goes to beast 
> mode, and charges again firing a stream of fire.
> 
> 



--part1_24.2061a9c4.2990a6ed_boundary
